categories: Gastropubs, Food, Beer Gardens, Restaurants, Bars, American (Traditional), Beer Bar, Nightlife, Breweries
text:
Stopped in on a busy Friday night. Despite the crowd, the service was expedient and warm. 

The beers here speak for themselves, so we sampled some of their taproom only offerings, and the galaxy smash was clean, tropical and sessionable.

This being said, the real star of this place is the pizza. It's a hand tossed style crust, that's the perfect mix of crispy and doughy. We ordered the special pizza (luau- bacon, pineapple and fresh jalape√±o), and it was the perfect mix of fat, sweetness and heat. 

If you're looking for a comfortable spot to grab a beer, and share some food with some friends on pearl, this is the place!

name: Oskar Blues Taproom
attributes: {'RestaurantsTableService': 'True', 'WiFi': "u'free'", 'BikeParking': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': True, 'validated': False, 'lot': False, 'valet': False}", 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'WheelchairAccessible': 'True', 'Caters': 'True', 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'HappyHour': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsBitcoin': 'False', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '2', 'Ambience': "{'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'romantic': False, 'divey': False, 'intimate': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'classy': False, 'casual': True}", 'HasTV': 'True', 'Alcohol': "'beer_and_wine'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': False, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'DogsAllowed': 'False', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'None'}
categories: Gastropubs, Food, Beer Gardens, Restaurants, Bars, American (Traditional), Beer Bar, Nightlife, Breweries
text: Went there about 1 PM on a Monday.  It wasn't particularly busy, and we were seated quickly.  Our drink order was taken promptly, one coke and one beer, and we didn't see our server again for 10 minutes.  I believe it was the bartender who finally brought the beer, but didn't get the coke. He then brought our second drink a few minutes later.  When we did see our server, she was  taking an order at another table, and then 5 minutes later brought those people their drinks.  Didn't see her again for another 5 minutes when she finally came back to take our order.  At that point we were more than 20 minutes into this place, and decided it wasn't worth any more waiting so we put a few bucks down and got up and left.  Very poor service.  No idea how the food is since we didn't even get our order in.  Only about the second place I had to walk out of due to extremely poor service.

name: Oskar Blues Taproom

text: This was the place the be on Friday Night! If you're looking for the best French Onion Soup in Boulder, paired with the best craft beer selection on Pearl Street. Go. Go now!

categories: Gastropubs, Food, Beer Gardens, Restaurants, Bars, American (Traditional), Beer Bar, Nightlife, Breweries
text: Went to this place with my family over the weekend after a hike in Boulder and it was really nice. Their patio is perfect for bringing your dog (you cannot have the dog on the patio but you can have them tied up on the other side and still have them very close to you) and also nice and big so there is lots of room on a beautiful, sunny day. Beers on tap were super cheap and they brought out samples when we weren't sure what to order. Wait staff was attentive. Everyone enjoyed their food but there was nothing special about it- typical brewery food.

name: Oskar Blues Taproom
attributes: {'RestaurantsTableService': 'True', 'WiFi': "u'free'", 'BikeParking': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': True, 'validated': False, 'lot': False, 'valet': False}", 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'WheelchairAccessible': 'True', 'Caters': 'True', 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'HappyHour': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsBitcoin': 'False', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '2', 'Ambience': "{'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'romantic': False, 'divey': False, 'intimate': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'classy': False, 'casual': True}", 'HasTV': 'True', 'Alcohol': "'beer_and_wine'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': False, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'DogsAllowed': 'False', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'None'}
categories: Gastropubs, Food, Beer Gardens, Restaurants, Bars, American (Traditional), Beer Bar, Nightlife, Breweries
text: Stopped on a midweek afternoon, and so glad that I did! One of the newer additions to the West End of Pearl Street, and it turns out to be a superb place to get a burger! Have been to the original Oskar Blues also, didn't disappoint. Lot of space to enjoy the restaurant and bar, plenty of indoor booths and tables, plenty of outside seating. Good atmosphere, some really fun items on the walls, and multiple giant screen televisions to stay on top of the latest games. Really appreciated the customer service from my server, Phoebe, who knew the menu, was extremely positive and professional, and could not have been better. Quick service, attention to detail. Loved my burger, cooked exactly as I requested, and the tater tots are so darn good. Liked their multiple in-house beverage options, had a great root beer! I'll definitely return!

text: Stopped in to sample some beer and ended up getting a pizza - the Pig and Fig.  Both were excellent.  Service was outstanding.  Have a great selection of beers other than Oskar Blues, especially from Cigar City.

text:
What a let down. We were so excited to come here. We were not only disappointed in their beer but also the ambience. It seems like a spin off of Margaritaville.
We had one beer and moved on to one of the better breweries in the area... don't do it!

categories: Gastropubs, Food, Beer Gardens, Restaurants, Bars, American (Traditional), Beer Bar, Nightlife, Breweries
text:
Great little spot! Service was prompt and kind. Food was tasty and everything seemed super fresh. Love Oskar Blues beer but it was great to see some other awesome guest taps. Crooked Stave and Trve are two of my favorite Colorado breweries, so great to see OB supporting local companies. 

My only complaint was the non-existent music. The World Cup soccer game was blasting. Since OB is known for being a company that supports (local) music and not being a sports bar, I was just a little thrown off.

text:
I had low expectations and was pleasantly blown away by my experience here.  Super friendly staff.  Good conversations.  Generous with the samples.  They even gave us a free beer they'd accidentally poured.

Delicious tater tots ... like unusually good.

Great beer selection.  Oskar B taps, of course, but plenty of others as well.

I look forward to returning.

text: Quick and friendly service on a cool Saturday - after totally ignored at a place down the street - made for a welcome respite from the wind. Huge windows for people-watching at a desirable Pearl Street location. Appetizer tots and pints of Dale's IPA & Apricot Hefeweisen did the trick. Will come back here next time we are in town.

text: Would've given this place a 5 star review for the opening day party. This place could be great EXCEPT it is insanely loud. You cannot hear someone sitting a foot away. Also we waited half an hour for a table (totally fine) but then we had no waiter for another 40 min.

name: Oskar Blues Taproom
attributes: {'RestaurantsTableService': 'True', 'WiFi': "u'free'", 'BikeParking': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': True, 'validated': False, 'lot': False, 'valet': False}", 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'WheelchairAccessible': 'True', 'Caters': 'True', 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'HappyHour': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsBitcoin': 'False', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '2', 'Ambience': "{'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'romantic': False, 'divey': False, 'intimate': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'classy': False, 'casual': True}", 'HasTV': 'True', 'Alcohol': "'beer_and_wine'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': False, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'DogsAllowed': 'False', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'None'}
categories: Gastropubs, Food, Beer Gardens, Restaurants, Bars, American (Traditional), Beer Bar, Nightlife, Breweries
text:
I'm sitting here at Oskar blues, waiting for the waiter to show up to take my credit card. After waiting 15 minutes with empty plates, we finally flagged down the hostess to ask for our check. Some other guy showed up and dropped the check off, then disappeared, it's been ten minutes since then. That's on top of it talking about 40 minutes for our orders of two slices and a cheeseburger to come out. We've been here for over an hour! I had time to sign up for a Yelp account and write this review while waiting.

The $4 for two slices at lunch isn't even worth it for this wait. It's a joke.

name: Oskar Blues Taproom
attributes: {'RestaurantsTableService': 'True', 'WiFi': "u'free'", 'BikeParking': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': True, 'validated': False, 'lot': False, 'valet': False}", 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'WheelchairAccessible': 'True', 'Caters': 'True', 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'HappyHour': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsBitcoin': 'False', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '2', 'Ambience': "{'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'romantic': False, 'divey': False, 'intimate': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'classy': False, 'casual': True}", 'HasTV': 'True', 'Alcohol': "'beer_and_wine'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': False, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'DogsAllowed': 'False', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'None'}
categories: Gastropubs, Food, Beer Gardens, Restaurants, Bars, American (Traditional), Beer Bar, Nightlife, Breweries
text: I really wanted to love this place, I love the OB in Longmont.  I come here for lunch and generally get pizza.  It's definitely the cheapest lunch on pearl street but it's also the saltiest pizza I've ever had.  Since they've opened the pizza has gotten saltier and sweeter.  Now either they suck at making pizza (I doubt it.  Making pizza is not difficult.) or they're dumping tons of salt in it to make people thirsty so they'll drink more beer.  When you crank the salt up that high you have to add sugar to cover it up, and that pretty much perfectly describes the taste of the pizza.  The service has been pretty indifferent as well, although for 4 bucks I'm not sure I can complain.  Fix your pizza, OB.

name: Oskar Blues Taproom
attributes: {'RestaurantsTableService': 'True', 'WiFi': "u'free'", 'BikeParking': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': True, 'validated': False, 'lot': False, 'valet': False}", 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'WheelchairAccessible': 'True', 'Caters': 'True', 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'HappyHour': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsBitcoin': 'False', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '2', 'Ambience': "{'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'romantic': False, 'divey': False, 'intimate': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'classy': False, 'casual': True}", 'HasTV': 'True', 'Alcohol': "'beer_and_wine'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': False, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'DogsAllowed': 'False', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'None'}
categories: Gastropubs, Food, Beer Gardens, Restaurants, Bars, American (Traditional), Beer Bar, Nightlife, Breweries
text: Crossing another solid brewery off my list! I've been excited to get in here and taste a few brews. The four of us walked in on a Saturday afternoon and we're seated after only a moment. Finding a comfortable booth we had a good view of the bar, as well as through the front windows overlooking Pearl Street. I enjoyed a Hotbox Coffee Porter and also tasted the Beerito Lager. Being a stout and porter lover I have high expectations. This Hotbox Coffee was outstanding with rich coffee notes and a clean, almost sweet finish! We received quick and tentative service with drinks on the table within minutes. Only passing through for a beer, we didn't order any food but the menu looked pretty tasty. I did however eat at the Lyons location where everything ordered was excellent. Pearl St. parking can be a tough but you can use one of the local parking garages, or find a side street a few blocks away and walk there. Four stars because they don't offer Gluten Free Beers. Overall we had a great experience, and I'm telling you to put this place on your list for must try breweries in the Boulder area!

name: Oskar Blues Taproom
attributes: {'RestaurantsTableService': 'True', 'WiFi': "u'free'", 'BikeParking': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': True, 'validated': False, 'lot': False, 'valet': False}", 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'WheelchairAccessible': 'True', 'Caters': 'True', 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'HappyHour': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsBitcoin': 'False', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '2', 'Ambience': "{'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'romantic': False, 'divey': False, 'intimate': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'classy': False, 'casual': True}", 'HasTV': 'True', 'Alcohol': "'beer_and_wine'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': False, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'DogsAllowed': 'False', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'None'}
categories: Gastropubs, Food, Beer Gardens, Restaurants, Bars, American (Traditional), Beer Bar, Nightlife, Breweries
text: Fun place to grab some bar food and hang out.  We got a pepperoni pizza which was surprisingly good for being a very beer focused place.  The sauce has a nice, sweet flavor.  The pepperoni are "sandwich" sized, which usually means a bit flavorless, but they were still tasty.  The cheese was really the star of the show.  I almost always order extra cheese, and I'm super glad I resisted this time.  It's a tasty, high quality mozzarella and they give you a *ton* of it, which made my day.  The only thing they could do to make it better would be to get the crust a bit more cooked and crispy.  The crust had an extremely chewy, undercooked texture.  The pizza is a bit big for one person, but not enough on it's own for 2 hungry people.  Though there are enough other small items that it's easy to share.  My wife got the gluten free pizza, which she was excited about because they make the dough in house.  After taking a few bites, she was noticeably less excited.  It has a weird, rice-flour-y taste and sponginess to it.  She'd probably just get apps the next time she stops by.

categories: Gastropubs, Food, Beer Gardens, Restaurants, Bars, American (Traditional), Beer Bar, Nightlife, Breweries
text:
I love going to Oskar Blues for the amazing lunch special but the way the staff treat me is why I recommend them to everyone I know.  Every experience has been wonderful because the fantastic wait staff made sure of it.  They are polite, prompt, and friendly. 

Another great thing about the tap room is that they are just far enough from the bricks that the dining area isn't super packed on Saturdays and Sundays.

The food exceeds my expectations too.

name: Oskar Blues Taproom
attributes: {'RestaurantsTableService': 'True', 'WiFi': "u'free'", 'BikeParking': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': True, 'validated': False, 'lot': False, 'valet': False}", 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'WheelchairAccessible': 'True', 'Caters': 'True', 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'HappyHour': 'True', 'BusinessAcceptsBitcoin': 'False', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '2', 'Ambience': "{'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'romantic': False, 'divey': False, 'intimate': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'classy': False, 'casual': True}", 'HasTV': 'True', 'Alcohol': "'beer_and_wine'", 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': False, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'DogsAllowed': 'False', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'None'}
categories: Gastropubs, Food, Beer Gardens, Restaurants, Bars, American (Traditional), Beer Bar, Nightlife, Breweries
text: This place is the best! I've been several times now and have been impressed with the service every time. I went for lunch today and couldn't decide which beer I wanted, so my server patiently brought me multiple samples and was super helpful! I've been to the Oskar Blues in Colorado Springs, but I honestly think the Boulder location is unique because of its location and vibe. The restaurant located right on Pearl, the space is very open, and the whole place has a very appealing visual aesthetic. Would 10/10 recommend this place- great service, great food, great beer. PS-- for sure the BEST fries in Boulder, possibly the best in all of Colorado.

I ordered for me and  my brother I got enough food to feed all of Angola very pumped.  If it's midnight and you drive thru they'll hook you up with basically the whole menu from what I gather. attributes: {'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'Caters': 'False', 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'Ambience': "{'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'romantic': False, 'divey': False, 'intimate': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'classy': False, 'casual': False}", 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': False, 'validated': False, 'lot': True, 'valet': False}", 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'DriveThru': 'True', 'WiFi': "u'no'", 'NoiseLevel': "u'loud'", 'HasTV': 'True', 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': False, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'OutdoorSeating': 'False', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True'}
categories: Restaurants, Tex-Mex, Tacos, Fast Food, Breakfast & Brunch, Mexican
text: I just moved to Boulder and I have attended this Taco Bell 3 times. The worst experience ever. All three times !!!! First time I i asked for a number 6 and I decided to change it before my order was complete and the guy gave me attitude about it. Got home and all my food was cold. Assuming they were mad because he said we already made what you originally ordered . Don't know why you made something before I was done ordering. ???? Second time they shorted me 1 taco and the third time they closed 15 minutes early. That is really unprofessional to do that. When i pulled up to the window they said we're closed with a look like should have known they wanted to leave early. I am never going back. If I were you I would take the extra drive and go to baseline location. This Taco Bell is TERRIBLE !!!!

attributes: {'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'Caters': 'False', 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'Ambience': "{'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'romantic': False, 'divey': False, 'intimate': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'classy': False, 'casual': False}", 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': False, 'validated': False, 'lot': True, 'valet': False}", 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'DriveThru': 'True', 'WiFi': "u'no'", 'NoiseLevel': "u'loud'", 'HasTV': 'True', 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': False, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'OutdoorSeating': 'False', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True'}
categories: Restaurants, Tex-Mex, Tacos, Fast Food, Breakfast & Brunch, Mexican
text:
Gotta give some love to Taco Bell. Relatively low turnover on staffing, even though they can be brutally slow. Generous portions of sour cream if you are looking for that. Honestly though, as a regular customer of this Taco Bell, I actually know some of the employees by name. That is rare in this day in age.

Food is Taco Bell quality.

name: Taco Bell
attributes: {'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'Caters': 'False', 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'Ambience': "{'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'romantic': False, 'divey': False, 'intimate': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'classy': False, 'casual': False}", 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': False, 'validated': False, 'lot': True, 'valet': False}", 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'DriveThru': 'True', 'WiFi': "u'no'", 'NoiseLevel': "u'loud'", 'HasTV': 'True', 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': False, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'OutdoorSeating': 'False', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True'}

text: I try to avoid fast food, but had to get something super quick before work last night. It's typical Taco Bell food, nothing new, but the girl that took my order was excellent! She was sweet and full of energy.  Sometimes it's just that extra effort that leaves a lasting impression!

name: Taco Bell
attributes: {'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'Caters': 'False', 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'Ambience': "{'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'romantic': False, 'divey': False, 'intimate': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'classy': False, 'casual': False}", 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': False, 'validated': False, 'lot': True, 'valet': False}", 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'DriveThru': 'True', 'WiFi': "u'no'", 'NoiseLevel': "u'loud'", 'HasTV': 'True', 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': False, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'OutdoorSeating': 'False', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True'}

text:
Get it together already taco bell on 28th!!! Expect long wait times...extremely understaffed locale.
This situation is incorrigible. Why do we still come here...we must be really desperately hungry.

name: Taco Bell
attributes: {'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'Caters': 'False', 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'Ambience': "{'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'romantic': False, 'divey': False, 'intimate': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'classy': False, 'casual': False}", 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': False, 'validated': False, 'lot': True, 'valet': False}", 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'DriveThru': 'True', 'WiFi': "u'no'", 'NoiseLevel': "u'loud'", 'HasTV': 'True', 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': False, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'OutdoorSeating': 'False', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True'}
categories: Restaurants, Tex-Mex, Tacos, Fast Food, Breakfast & Brunch, Mexican
text:
I actually really like this Taco Bell as far as fast food chains go. They have never gotten my order wrong in the decade or so that I have coming here. The staff is usually pretty friendly and has never had any problems with the off chance you want something modified or made special. Even during lunch the wait time is usually pretty fast and with the ability to order on mobile now has made it even easier.

The interior is always pretty clean even right after the lunch rush and even the bathrooms seem to be well maintained. all the condiments and food accessories are always stocked and the soda fountain machine appears to be cleaned regularly. I see employees go around cleaning things when there is a gap in the service.

Food quality I think is also as good as you can get from Taco Bell. I've never gotten something that felt like it was made hours ago and just sitting around. The food is always hot and made as advertised.

name: Taco Bell
attributes: {'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'Caters': 'False', 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'Ambience': "{'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'romantic': False, 'divey': False, 'intimate': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'classy': False, 'casual': False}", 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': False, 'validated': False, 'lot': True, 'valet': False}", 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'DriveThru': 'True', 'WiFi': "u'no'", 'NoiseLevel': "u'loud'", 'HasTV': 'True', 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': False, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'OutdoorSeating': 'False', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True'}

text: Worst Taco Bell ever. If you are prepared to consistently wait over 20 minutes for an incorrect order, by all means visit this location.

name: Taco Bell

text:
This is really close to our office and so when I need something for lunch fast, I hit this at times.

The food is Taco Bell.

What gives this 1 star is about 20% of the time you order and then wait... and wait... and wait... Sometimes up to 20 minutes for your food.

name: Taco Bell
attributes: {'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'Caters': 'False', 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'Ambience': "{'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'romantic': False, 'divey': False, 'intimate': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'classy': False, 'casual': False}", 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': False, 'validated': False, 'lot': True, 'valet': False}", 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'DriveThru': 'True', 'WiFi': "u'no'", 'NoiseLevel': "u'loud'", 'HasTV': 'True', 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': False, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'OutdoorSeating': 'False', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True'}

text: Apparently in the last month or so corporate bought them out. Why I keep on coming back I don't know?! I'm addicted to the crunch wrap supreme. Lol I have now been in the drive-through for 30 minutes. This isn't first time it's the third time and I will not come back. Why not leave good enough alone!

name: Taco Bell
attributes: {'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'Caters': 'False', 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'Ambience': "{'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'romantic': False, 'divey': False, 'intimate': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'classy': False, 'casual': False}", 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': False, 'validated': False, 'lot': True, 'valet': False}", 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'Alcohol': "u'none'", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1', 'DriveThru': 'True', 'WiFi': "u'no'", 'NoiseLevel': "u'loud'", 'HasTV': 'True', 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': False, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'OutdoorSeating': 'False', 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'BikeParking': 'True'}
categories: Restaurants, Tex-Mex, Tacos, Fast Food, Breakfast & Brunch, Mexican
text: Worst taco bell ever. Every time we go there they have their doors locked. It's 9:00 and they say they are open till 1.. why the heck are your doors locked. I called to see and they were very rude and said they were closing early anyway.

name: Valley Chrysler-Dodge
categories: Car Dealers, Auto Repair, Automotive
text: DO NOT BUY/SERVICE YOUR VEHICLE HERE! This dealer deserves zero stars. I bought a used VW from a Chrysler dealership in MN and because I have a 2 year service contract with them I was forced to take my car here when I moved to CO and started having electrical problems. They are the rudest group of mechanics/dealers I have ever dealt with. They have kept my car for multiple days for simple fixes which have not been successful. They do the bare minimum on repairs and take way too long to complete them, and they will not return your calls or voluntarily call you with new information on your car- I had to call them several times throughout the day to find out if I would even get my car back that day, and they called me at 5 pm and told me they'd need to keep it over night and bring it to a different mechanic the next morning because they couldn't fix it themselves. They also didn't offer to set me up with a rental car- it was like pulling teeth trying to get any information from them. I would NEVER buy a car from them, and am currently trying to sell my car so that I don't have any ties to this dealer anymore. Oh, and avoid Stuart (service department)- this man obviously hates his job, hates people, and will make it very clear how much you are inconveniencing him while he sits behind his desk answering phones.

name: Valley Chrysler-Dodge
categories: Car Dealers, Auto Repair, Automotive
text: I recently purchased a Charger SRT 8 in January and received an automated call saying it was time for a routine maintenance visit. I took it in to the dealership because of my warranty, despite the fact I normally use Oil Can Henry's on other cars that I own without warranties. I went in with high expectations due to the fact that its a dealership. After getting my oil changed and tires rotated I noticed the service department bent the body by putting it on the lift wrong, the reason I gave them a two star rating is because Matt the service manager was nice enough to accept fault and fix my car. Luckily I have other vehicles because they did not offer a loaner vehicle while they had mine for two days. He did offer me a ride back to longmont though. I took pictures this time around to make sure things were on the up and up, because now I don't trust their work. When I got it back the body damage was gone along with all the gas I had in the car and nearly 100 miles was put on my car (hope they enjoyed driving it) they left my interior dirty with greasy hand prints on the top of the ceiling padding. I didn't complain a second time around, but I will not be back, that's not the kind of service I expect when spending $30,000.00 on a car.

name: Valley Chrysler-Dodge
categories: Car Dealers, Auto Repair, Automotive
text: I had a terrible experience with Valley Chrysler-Dodge. They sold me a car with a bad engine and I found out the hard way by breaking down on the highway within the first few days. When I contacted them about this issue, they told me I knew what I had purchased and refused to help. This place is your average scummy car dealership.. look elsewhere!

name: Valley Chrysler-Dodge
categories: Car Dealers, Auto Repair, Automotive
text: I had a very pleasant experience with Valley Dodge and would refer them to my friends and family.

name: Sancho's Authentic Mexican Restaurant

categories: Restaurants, Mexican
text: This food here is alright, but they just raised prices and it's now unreasonable. My go to meal went up by $4. $12 for a small lunch takes this place off my list.

name: Sancho's Authentic Mexican Restaurant
attributes: {'BikeParking': 'True', 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'HasTV': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'Ambience': "{'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'romantic': False, 'divey': False, 'intimate': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'classy': False, 'casual': False}", 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'WiFi': "'no'", 'Caters': 'True', 'HappyHour': 'True', 'Alcohol': "u'beer_and_wine'", 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'WheelchairAccessible': 'True', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsTableService': 'False', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': True, 'validated': False, 'lot': True, 'valet': False}", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '2'}
categories: Restaurants, Mexican
text:
This place is really depressing.

The staff couldn't be bothered to care. When I ordered a burrito, he asked what kind of meat I wanted. I asked what my options were. *blank stare* "Any of the taco meats." Thanks, dude- not helpful. Not helpful at all.

The food is super overpriced. $9 for a burrito is in line with a sit down restaurant- not fast casual (or slow casual, as the case may be). The plate of fries we ordered for my son was incredibly small (barely a handful) for $3. The chips lacked anything resembling flavor. The meat was overcooked, the rice was mushy, and the tablespoon of guac on the side was pitiful. It's clear all the food comes out of a steam table, and the temp on it needs to be turned up- everything was cold. I love me a good salsa bar, but theirs is a bad salsa bar.

The decor is grimy, ugly, and confusing (Tibetan prayer flags- wtf?). I pulled a knife out of the cafeteria-style silverware holder, and it had food chunks stuck to it.

So yeah- overpriced, depressing, and kinda gross.

This place won't be here long.

name: Sancho's Authentic Mexican Restaurant
attributes: {'BikeParking': 'True', 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'HasTV': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'Ambience': "{'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'romantic': False, 'divey': False, 'intimate': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'classy': False, 'casual': False}", 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'WiFi': "'no'", 'Caters': 'True', 'HappyHour': 'True', 'Alcohol': "u'beer_and_wine'", 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'WheelchairAccessible': 'True', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsTableService': 'False', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': True, 'validated': False, 'lot': True, 'valet': False}", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '2'}
categories: Restaurants, Mexican
text: Honestly the best street tacos I've had here since moving from LA. Salsa counter was a great touch. If you gave this place a bad review you belong at La Mariposa or Three Margaritas.

name: Sancho's Authentic Mexican Restaurant
attributes: {'BikeParking': 'True', 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'HasTV': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'Ambience': "{'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'romantic': False, 'divey': False, 'intimate': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'classy': False, 'casual': False}", 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'WiFi': "'no'", 'Caters': 'True', 'HappyHour': 'True', 'Alcohol': "u'beer_and_wine'", 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'WheelchairAccessible': 'True', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsTableService': 'False', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': True, 'validated': False, 'lot': True, 'valet': False}", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '2'}

text: Great addition to the gunbarrel area. Finally something besides Bk and sandwiches. I like the steak tacos but my co-worker prefers chicken. I recommend this restaurant and hope it sticks around.

name: Sancho's Authentic Mexican Restaurant
attributes: {'BikeParking': 'True', 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'HasTV': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'Ambience': "{'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'romantic': False, 'divey': False, 'intimate': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'classy': False, 'casual': False}", 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'WiFi': "'no'", 'Caters': 'True', 'HappyHour': 'True', 'Alcohol': "u'beer_and_wine'", 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'WheelchairAccessible': 'True', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsTableService': 'False', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': True, 'validated': False, 'lot': True, 'valet': False}", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '2'}
categories: Restaurants, Mexican
text: So excited to see Sancho's opened their restaurant here. It's probably the best place to eat around. Great food and fast authentic Mexican food. One thing, I wish, and I know many people feel the same way, is to be opened for dinner as well. With so many people around here, I am sure they would do great. Maybe test it out guys! Nothing to loose ;)

name: Sancho's Authentic Mexican Restaurant
attributes: {'BikeParking': 'True', 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'HasTV': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'Ambience': "{'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'romantic': False, 'divey': False, 'intimate': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'classy': False, 'casual': False}", 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'WiFi': "'no'", 'Caters': 'True', 'HappyHour': 'True', 'Alcohol': "u'beer_and_wine'", 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'WheelchairAccessible': 'True', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsTableService': 'False', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': True, 'validated': False, 'lot': True, 'valet': False}", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '2'}

text:
Great food, and really nice folks! I work in the area, and Sancho's in a favorite. The tacos are great, and the burritos are huge and delicious!
I'm a regular!

name: Sancho's Authentic Mexican Restaurant
attributes: {'BikeParking': 'True', 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'HasTV': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'Ambience': "{'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'romantic': False, 'divey': False, 'intimate': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'classy': False, 'casual': False}", 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'WiFi': "'no'", 'Caters': 'True', 'HappyHour': 'True', 'Alcohol': "u'beer_and_wine'", 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'WheelchairAccessible': 'True', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsTableService': 'False', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': True, 'validated': False, 'lot': True, 'valet': False}", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '2'}
categories: Restaurants, Mexican
text: Food is pretty decent but the service is awful! I don't know if the man taking our order was the owner or what but when you have 5 different salsas out and we ask for a little side cup to put it in, it's because we don't know which ones we would like to put all over our food. He said no to our request and said we can just dump it from the container to our food and the cups are for To go orders only. Personally that's unsanitary as people may touch the spoon to food that has already been eaten off of and second if I do put something on my taco and end up hating it, are you going to remake it for me since you wouldn't let me sample the free sauce before hand?!? Won't be going back. If the cost of tiny plastic containers worry you that much, close your business because you have bigger issues.

name: Sancho's Authentic Mexican Restaurant
attributes: {'BikeParking': 'True', 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'HasTV': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'Ambience': "{'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'romantic': False, 'divey': False, 'intimate': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'classy': False, 'casual': False}", 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'WiFi': "'no'", 'Caters': 'True', 'HappyHour': 'True', 'Alcohol': "u'beer_and_wine'", 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'WheelchairAccessible': 'True', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsTableService': 'False', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': True, 'validated': False, 'lot': True, 'valet': False}", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '2'}
categories: Restaurants, Mexican
text: I tried placing a order for pick up on Wednesday the 10th at 12:15pm for my lunch over the phone when I was asked to call back in ten minutes because they where busy at the moment as I tried to tell her that I had my lunch in 10 minutes she just hung up on me. All I wanted was some tacos and a drink its not that hard to take that order if you were so busy why would you answer the phone why not just put me on hold or better yet just take my order lady.!!! I can assure I won't be returning to this business anymore with service like that after all the other times I gone there I regret it now.

name: Sancho's Authentic Mexican Restaurant

text: Before my acupuncture treatment last week, I had a hankering for lingua - tongue. I knew Sancho's would have it. I settled on the torta - sandwich. I tried this Sancho's when it first opened and wasn't impressed and decided to give it another try. It was packed, but I missed the rush. They also have a variety of aguas including horchata, which was good. Next time, I'm going for a caldo, maybe sopa siete mares.

text: Unfortunately the food had little spices and lacked freshness. They left off the guacamole and when asked for it, they seemed offended. The remodeling of the space is poorly done and was not clean. We will not be back. I really was hoping for a good Mexican food spot.

name: Sancho's Authentic Mexican Restaurant
attributes: {'BikeParking': 'True', 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'HasTV': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'Ambience': "{'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'romantic': False, 'divey': False, 'intimate': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'classy': False, 'casual': False}", 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'WiFi': "'no'", 'Caters': 'True', 'HappyHour': 'True', 'Alcohol': "u'beer_and_wine'", 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'WheelchairAccessible': 'True', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsTableService': 'False', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': True, 'validated': False, 'lot': True, 'valet': False}", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '2'}
categories: Restaurants, Mexican
text:
The staff are very disengaged and rude.  The guy who took our order was vacant of any normal human interaction you would expect in the restaurant industry. The guy who dropped our food off did just that, dropped our food off and took off. The restaurant was not busy so that cannot be the excuse for this poor customer service. 

The design of fast casual where you order food is very cramped.  If the restaurant wants to do fast casual the prices need to reflect that type of service. 

The food quality is a C-. I can deal with average Mexican food BUT will not return based on how your staff treats your customers.  No excuses.

name: Sancho's Authentic Mexican Restaurant
attributes: {'BikeParking': 'True', 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'HasTV': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'Ambience': "{'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'romantic': False, 'divey': False, 'intimate': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'classy': False, 'casual': False}", 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'WiFi': "'no'", 'Caters': 'True', 'HappyHour': 'True', 'Alcohol': "u'beer_and_wine'", 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'WheelchairAccessible': 'True', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsTableService': 'False', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': True, 'validated': False, 'lot': True, 'valet': False}", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '2'}
categories: Restaurants, Mexican
text: The food at Sancho's is so delicious, but unfortunately, I will not be eating there ever again. I've had 2 bad experiences with quality of food here. The first time I discovered a tomato in my dish that was completely moldy and rotten. I decided to give them the benefit of the doubt even though the kitchen staff should have caught this before it got to a customer. The second negative experience I got HORRIBLE food poisoning. The worst experience of my life. I'm disappointed because they do have great, authentic Mexican...but the conditions of the kitchen clearly are not sanitary to be serving food.

name: Sancho's Authentic Mexican Restaurant
attributes: {'BikeParking': 'True', 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'HasTV': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'Ambience': "{'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'romantic': False, 'divey': False, 'intimate': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'classy': False, 'casual': False}", 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'WiFi': "'no'", 'Caters': 'True', 'HappyHour': 'True', 'Alcohol': "u'beer_and_wine'", 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'WheelchairAccessible': 'True', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsTableService': 'False', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': True, 'validated': False, 'lot': True, 'valet': False}", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '2'}
categories: Restaurants, Mexican
text: I go to Sancho's occasionally, I work in the area and it's a good change to the sandwiches but nothing there is really that good. The one saving grace for me WAS the aquacado burrito. I love it, well used to. The last time the last one I got the shredded beef was so burnt and over cooked it was kind of gross to eat but I was at work and didn't have other options. I tried again today and got another burrito with shredded beef I checked it before I left because sometimes they forget the guacamole and sour cream and it looked fine. They put chicarone in it instead. I don't like fried pork skins, at all. I had to pick around all the meat. Definitely won't be back, which is a shame and will not recommend either .

name: Sancho's Authentic Mexican Restaurant
attributes: {'BikeParking': 'True', 'GoodForMeal': "{'dessert': False, 'latenight': False, 'lunch': True, 'dinner': False, 'brunch': False, 'breakfast': False}", 'HasTV': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'Ambience': "{'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'romantic': False, 'divey': False, 'intimate': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'classy': False, 'casual': False}", 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'WiFi': "'no'", 'Caters': 'True', 'HappyHour': 'True', 'Alcohol': "u'beer_and_wine'", 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'True', 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "'casual'", 'WheelchairAccessible': 'True', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'RestaurantsTableService': 'False', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': True, 'validated': False, 'lot': True, 'valet': False}", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '2'}
categories: Restaurants, Mexican
text: I have given this place multiple chances at different times of day but I can't do it anymore. Today, my boyfriend and I went in to try it for the LAST time. We walked in and the place is empty so the wait shouldn't be too long. We ordered the Chile rellenos and the enchiladas, got our number, and sat down at a table in the dining room. While waiting, I went over to the salsa bar to check out their options. There weren't any cups so I went back to the counter to ask for some but the lady I went to talk to (who was standing at a computer, looking ready to take an order) looked at me, said something in Spanish and walked away before asking if she could help with anything. Rude. Then another lady walked over and when I asked for sauce cups told me "you can't have any, they're for to go customers only". Ok, all I want is to have a variety of sauces to use but fine. Our food comes out and within the first 2 bites, flies start swarming our table to the point where we can't eat comfortably so we try to move out to the patio. Their door out to the patio is locked (ridiculous) so we take the food out the front door and walk around. The food is bland, soggy, and boring. We still eat about half of our plates because we were very hungry but eventually had to give up on the unappetizing display put forth. This place won't last and I hope someone moves in who actually cares about the quality of their food.

text: We visited Colorado this last weekend for a wedding and we tried some local restaurants near by, Sanchos was one of them. I loved the atmosphere and everyone was really friendly. We had the queso dip which was delicious and a steak quesadilla which was also great! I will definitely come back next time I visit the area!

categories: Restaurants, Mexican
text:
I hate to give a bad review... and I also like to support local businesses. 
I've had tacos here that were ok. But 2 days ago I ordered a dinner to pick up. It was $13+ for the carne asada. What I got was these thin slices of meat that were hard and dry, impossible to cut. I had to pick it up and tear it with my teeth. Flavorless, dry, chewy meat. I sent a message to them on their website contact form and had no response back. That is how much they care, I guess. 
I suppose the meat was sliced so thin because it was so cheap and tough. 
So basically I paid over $13 for some beans and lettuce. The meat was not edible. I hope they get it together and start having better service, higher quality food and make all those craving good mex very happy.

text:
Excellent addition to the Hill line-up.  Esp. when you consider the limited options
for 'real food' when it comes to close campus dining.  The restaurants that make up the bulk of the hill are for the most part burgers, burritos, and sandwiches and with the middle eastern offerings at Pickled Lemon, the diversity is much welcome.

I would recommend the vegi plate, that is all I have tried so far and the serving size was plentiful and the taste strikingly strong.

text: I visited Pickled Lemon within a few weeks of their opening.  While I was hoping for amazing, quick Mediterranean food on par with Udi's, that's not what I got.  The chicken was luke warm and rubbery and the various sauces (Tzatziki wasn't offered) were disappointing.  Others seem to have much better luck with vegetarian meals but still, how about you grill my chicken instead of microwaving it?

text:
This place is awesome. I like Garbanzo just fine, but the flavors here are infinitely better. The meat is pretty good, but as Amanda W. said, the vegetables are the highlight. The pita is awesome, which comes as no surprise since this place is run by Udi's. Everything is fresh and as good as I would expect from a much more expensive restaurant. The portions are perfect too!

Also, the pickled lemons were tasty.

text: CLOSED! I was in Boulder today and of course I headed for the only Israeli place in Colorado that I know of. They're gone. The building is empty and for lease. This is going to make my time in the Denver area much less enjoyable, but to be fair, there was never anyone in this place. That's why I'm always nervous when I see empty seats. It's inevitable that they lead to failure.

name: Pickled Lemon
attributes: {'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'Alcohol': "u'beer_and_wine'", 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'WiFi': "u'free'", 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'HasTV': 'False', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': True, 'validated': False, 'lot': False, 'valet': False}", 'Caters': 'True', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1'}
categories: Middle Eastern, Restaurants
text: My husband and I just spent 10 days in Boulder and my daughter, who lives there, suggested we go to Pickled Lemon. Great suggestion! We loved it! My husband is very particular about food and especially about falafel. We went there four times in 10 days! We got the falafel plate and once I got the hummus plate. Both excellent! It is the kind of food that is so fresh and flavorful, I always felt I was not only indulging my taste buds, but also eating something that was actually good for me. I liked the rice and lentils, the pickled beets, cabbage slaw, curried carrots, kale, broccoli, baba ganoush, and of course the hummus and falafel (vibrant green!). The sauces are yummy, too. There was a hot cilantro paste that was good; tahini great. The "Iragi catsup" is spicy good; my husband loved the garlic sauce. The pita bread is made by Udi's in Boulder and it is warm, soft and thick and not like you buy in the store. The people there are very friendly and helpful. We met Oscar, Robin and Jade.  We highly recommend it for a casual, tasty nutritious meal. We were always there at lunch, but I believe they also have some evening hours and serve beer and mixed drinks. Nice outdoor area great for people watching! Located on the Hill across from CU campus.

name: Pickled Lemon
attributes: {'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'Alcohol': "u'beer_and_wine'", 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'WiFi': "u'free'", 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'HasTV': 'False', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': True, 'validated': False, 'lot': False, 'valet': False}", 'Caters': 'True', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1'}
categories: Middle Eastern, Restaurants
text:
Pickled Lemon is great. The prices are very reasonable, and you can get tons of food. The food is always fresh and very tasty. I have been there maybe 20 times since it opened. I've had the falafel plate and the hummus plate. I prefer the hummus plate because it's a little less heavy, but the falafel is also good. This place is by far the best Mediterranean-ish food in Boulder (and yes, I'm including The Med in this comparison--deal with it).

I'm vegan and it's really easy to get a good meal here. Every component is really good. It's hard to beat on the Hill.

name: Pickled Lemon
attributes: {'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'Alcohol': "u'beer_and_wine'", 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'WiFi': "u'free'", 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'HasTV': 'False', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': True, 'validated': False, 'lot': False, 'valet': False}", 'Caters': 'True', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1'}
categories: Middle Eastern, Restaurants
text: FINALLY! A fast-casual eatery on the hill with fresh ingredients, great atmosphere and unique food. I love Pickled Lemon and I highly recommend this place to students, teachers, and just about anyone else. My favorite thing to get is the chicken schwarma pita sandwich... the bread is AWESOME. I like to put a lot of the toppings in it because it packs it with flavor. Very fulfilling meal when you are in the mood for something different and delicious. Great pita chips too! Don't forget to try the different sauces!

name: Pickled Lemon
attributes: {'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'Alcohol': "u'beer_and_wine'", 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'WiFi': "u'free'", 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'HasTV': 'False', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': True, 'validated': False, 'lot': False, 'valet': False}", 'Caters': 'True', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1'}
categories: Middle Eastern, Restaurants
text:
When we walked in it was empty and I felt a little sorry for the place but soon after we started ordering, the line went to the door and stayed full till we left.

This place is sooooooo good.   I got the Greek salad expecting the usual but got lots of wonderful surprises in my mouth instead.  Spicy cauliflower, mint flavored zucchini, horseradish beets, those amazing pita chips along with the falafel and that soft luscious pita bread.  Kale as a salad addition really works.

Normally I need some dressing a salad but there were so many delicious flavors, I didn't need any of the sauces.  

Oh, add on a tahini butter cookie - interesting, rich, not too sweet.

name: Pickled Lemon
attributes: {'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'Alcohol': "u'beer_and_wine'", 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'WiFi': "u'free'", 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'HasTV': 'False', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': True, 'validated': False, 'lot': False, 'valet': False}", 'Caters': 'True', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1'}
categories: Middle Eastern, Restaurants
text: This is my absolute favorite place on the hill - I can never resist getting lunch here. Everything they have is healthy and delicious. Their staff are always super friendly as well. They seem to change up their salad toppings quite a bit, and the dipping sauces are great. Definitely going to continue coming back over and over for lunch.

name: Pickled Lemon
attributes: {'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'Alcohol': "u'beer_and_wine'", 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'WiFi': "u'free'", 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'HasTV': 'False', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': True, 'validated': False, 'lot': False, 'valet': False}", 'Caters': 'True', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1'}
categories: Middle Eastern, Restaurants
text:
What did I expect from Pickled Lemon? More than I got. Why did I expect more? I guess that I'm an idiot. A sabich without a hardboiled egg? That's like a burger without the beef. The staff didn't help, being esentially clueless. It took me 5 minutes to ascertain that 1) they don't understand Hebrew 2) they don't know their own menu.

That being said, the food was pretty good. The salads are pretty authentic, with a few Boulder type of additions such as kale. Prices are perfectly reasonable, but only for the food. Drinks are ridiculously overpriced, but when it's nearing 100 degrees, what choice does one have? So, for $10.50, I got a yummy if not totally fulfilling sandwich and a drink. One downer was the harissa, which is more like ketchup, no heat whatsoever. I will be back ,and I'll try some shawarma with jalapeno sauce.

name: Pickled Lemon
attributes: {'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'Alcohol': "u'beer_and_wine'", 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'WiFi': "u'free'", 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'HasTV': 'False', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': True, 'validated': False, 'lot': False, 'valet': False}", 'Caters': 'True', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1'}
categories: Middle Eastern, Restaurants
text:
My new favorite lunch place.  I've been in here at least once a week since I first found out about the Pickled Lemon, and often times more than that.  I have seen "Chipotle-style" fast casual Middle Eastern before, but what separates this place from the others is the attention to detail, and a slightly pared down menu that chooses quality over quantity.  Falafel is made fresh to order, and there are a wide variety of toppings to choose from for your pita or your platter.  You can make your own unique combination of dish depending on what toppings you include, all of which are tasty, healthy, and work well with one another.  I am especially fond of the horseradish beets, which are out of this world.  An assortment of six sauces reflecting various Middle Eastern cuisines (harissa from North Africa, mango amba (?) from Iraq, tahini, etc.) are provided gratis, with little take away cups and lids.

Best of all, this place is cheap.  With tip, a pita can be had for under 8 bucks.  And they are wicked fast.  My only complaint lie with the hours: I can't wait for them to be open outside of the weekday lunch hours (they just started to open on Saturdays, and remain open later on Fridays).  This place blows away the competition in Boulder based on price and by a long shot on quality.  It is also a local business, and the owners are heavily vested in making sure this place serves it customers right.  Finally, they cater, so if you are looking for delicious inexpensive food (especially if you are vegetarian or require gluten-free), make sure to check it out!

name: Pickled Lemon
attributes: {'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'Alcohol': "u'beer_and_wine'", 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': False, 'trendy': False, 'upscale': False, 'casual': True}", 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'WiFi': "u'free'", 'GoodForKids': 'True', 'HasTV': 'False', 'RestaurantsReservations': 'False', 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': False, 'street': True, 'validated': False, 'lot': False, 'valet': False}", 'Caters': 'True', 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '1'}
categories: Middle Eastern, Restaurants
text: I wish there was one of these places in Denver.  The tastes are amazing.  The falafel and chicken schwarma were my favorite mains.  Don't miss the moroccan carrots if you like spice.  I loved the green tahini!

name: Ristorante L
attributes: {'RestaurantsReservations': 'True', 'Alcohol': "'full_bar'", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '3', 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'Caters': 'False', 'GoodForKids': 'False', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BYOBCorkage': "'yes_corkage'", 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': True, 'street': False, 'validated': False, 'lot': False, 'valet': False}", 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'False', 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': True, 'trendy': True, 'upscale': False, 'casual': False}", 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'HasTV': 'True', 'Corkage': 'True', 'HappyHour': 'True'}
categories: Restaurants, Beer, Wine & Spirits, Food, Italian
text:
I want to give them 4 stars, but the 4 and 5 star experiences I've had there are very specific.

First, the good:
1. Love their special lunch menu - salad or appetizer, choice of a few entrees or sandwiches, and then choose between a few different desserts for under $20. Always good. Never a bad lunch there.
2. Despite the fact that it's not my go-to place, whenever I have visitors from out of town, they LOVE it there and I like having it in my back-pocket.
3. Their Eggplant parm is to DIE for. For reals. Amazingly mild and flavorful eggplant, not bitter at all, and their tomato sauce mixed with their cream sauce. Oh. My. Goodness.
4. Their side salad is delish - a great mix of greens, other veggies, and some spicy peppers that aren't too spicy. I don't even put dressing on it.
5. Love sitting on their patio in the summer and then going to see a movie. Such a relaxing date.
6. Took my mom there for Christmas Eve last year (get a reservation!) and we had a two hour meal. It was grand and the service was fabulous.

Now, the meh:
1. In the winter, when you can't sit outside, it's a bit crowded, dim, and loud. This is a common theme in my reviews. I'm not a fan of crowded loud places. If you are, then disregard this. Honestly, it's not that bad, I just struggle to filter out background noise.
2. I can't drink wine and their cocktails are good but not great
3. Menu is good, and nothing on it is less than good. Things are prepared just so, and lots of fresh ingredients. But the menu has been basically the same for three years and nothing on it (except the eggplant parm! See above) is so amazing as to eclipse other places rendition or so creative as to cause one to think, "I have to go there again soon!"
4. It is pricey. That seems to be the way of it with good Italian in Boulder. They are not worse or better than anywhere else.

I go several times a year. I like it. The good is way good-er than the bad. It's just not amazingpants.

name: Ristorante L
attributes: {'RestaurantsReservations': 'True', 'Alcohol': "'full_bar'", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '3', 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'Caters': 'False', 'GoodForKids': 'False', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BYOBCorkage': "'yes_corkage'", 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': True, 'street': False, 'validated': False, 'lot': False, 'valet': False}", 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'False', 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': True, 'trendy': True, 'upscale': False, 'casual': False}", 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'HasTV': 'True', 'Corkage': 'True', 'HappyHour': 'True'}
categories: Restaurants, Beer, Wine & Spirits, Food, Italian
text:
I'm surprised this place hasn't gotten better reviews but I suppose it can vary by night.  While I'm giving it a 4, it's probably a 3.5 to 4, depending on the night, etc.  We've been 3-4 times now and enjoyed our experience.  This most recent time, we were in a bit of a time crunch and let the waitress know.  She did a good job of moving everything along, with only a short wait for extra bread (dipping sauce for mussels in pasta).

It is recommended to get the "house" fresh pasta instead - it is much better and very rich.  Do ask for a corner table or booth if possible, as it can get quite loud later in the day.  

Overall we've enjoyed the food and service, but we do go at less busy times (before 6:30) and we don't order complicated service or go with lots of people.  For two though, it's a nice quick place with a variety of good foods.

Oh, and to the reviewer with the restroom issue - report that to a manager next time and they will take care of it - every time I've been, it has been clean.

name: Ristorante L
attributes: {'RestaurantsReservations': 'True', 'Alcohol': "'full_bar'", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '3', 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'Caters': 'False', 'GoodForKids': 'False', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BYOBCorkage': "'yes_corkage'", 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': True, 'street': False, 'validated': False, 'lot': False, 'valet': False}", 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'False', 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': True, 'trendy': True, 'upscale': False, 'casual': False}", 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'HasTV': 'True', 'Corkage': 'True', 'HappyHour': 'True'}
categories: Restaurants, Beer, Wine & Spirits, Food, Italian
text:
I hate to give them 3 stars but the most recent experience I had here left something to be desired. 

Came in to the cafe/bar/only place there were people during what I would assume is happy hour time. When we walked in we weren't greeted and in fact the hostess for that night walked in after us, back turned, clocked in and walked to the back. I'll seat myself, no worries.

Promptly greeted by a nice waitress with menus already on our table and fired off some quick orders with her. Most of the dishes we ordered were fantastic. The meatballs...not so much. Being an Italian restaurant with a storied history in Boulder you would think the execution would be flawless, they seemed undercooked and sinewy, not very good. 

Other than the left over stamps (from the night before) on their hands the waitstaff looked very professional. There was clearly a group of friendlies at the bar getting good and wasted which seemed to distract them somewhat.

name: Ristorante L
attributes: {'RestaurantsReservations': 'True', 'Alcohol': "'full_bar'", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '3', 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'Caters': 'False', 'GoodForKids': 'False', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BYOBCorkage': "'yes_corkage'", 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': True, 'street': False, 'validated': False, 'lot': False, 'valet': False}", 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'False', 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': True, 'trendy': True, 'upscale': False, 'casual': False}", 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'HasTV': 'True', 'Corkage': 'True', 'HappyHour': 'True'}
categories: Restaurants, Beer, Wine & Spirits, Food, Italian
text:
Went there for appetizers and drinks while visiting Boulder for graduation ceremonies at CU. Decent happy hour offering and a good wine list, thoiugh I opted for beer. 

Calamari I had was good. Also had a little of their arancini. These were really "mini-arancini" as the true dish is a rather large rice ball that is fairly inexpensive. The two that came with the appetizer were about a 1/3 of the serving that an ordinary arancini would be. Decent taste, but kinda pricey for what it was.

I'd try it again, especially to see if the entrees are any good. Looks like there are a grwong number of Yelp doubters out there on this place.

name: Ristorante L
attributes: {'RestaurantsReservations': 'True', 'Alcohol': "'full_bar'", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '3', 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'Caters': 'False', 'GoodForKids': 'False', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BYOBCorkage': "'yes_corkage'", 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': True, 'street': False, 'validated': False, 'lot': False, 'valet': False}", 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'False', 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': True, 'trendy': True, 'upscale': False, 'casual': False}", 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'HasTV': 'True', 'Corkage': 'True', 'HappyHour': 'True'}
categories: Restaurants, Beer, Wine & Spirits, Food, Italian
text:
Brought a date here a couple weeks ago and had a very good experience.  I ordered the eggplant parmesean (my go-to Italian dish, especially at a new place), and I was not disappointed.  It was cooked and seasoned well, although they went a little bit heavy on the cheese for my taste.  I'd been told that many of their dishes have a lot of cheese, so I was not shocked.

I had made a late dinner reservation just in case, but we probably would've been fine without it.  We were seated promptly, and out server was very attentive, especially to our drinks.  We did not have any wine or dessert, so I can't comment on those aspects of the menu.

Overall, we both enjoyed our experience and would gladly return.  The food and service was very good, and I thought the prices were reasonable.  There definitely more expensive specialty dishes, but the staples are very affordable.  Excellent atmosphere, too.

name: Ristorante L
attributes: {'RestaurantsReservations': 'True', 'Alcohol': "'full_bar'", 'RestaurantsPriceRange2': '3', 'OutdoorSeating': 'True', 'RestaurantsTakeOut': 'True', 'Caters': 'False', 'GoodForKids': 'False', 'BusinessAcceptsCreditCards': 'True', 'RestaurantsAttire': "u'casual'", 'RestaurantsGoodForGroups': 'True', 'BYOBCorkage': "'yes_corkage'", 'BusinessParking': "{'garage': True, 'street': False, 'validated': False, 'lot': False, 'valet': False}", 'RestaurantsDelivery': 'False', 'Ambience': "{'romantic': False, 'intimate': False, 'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'divey': False, 'classy': True, 'trendy': True, 'upscale': False, 'casual': False}", 'NoiseLevel': "u'average'", 'HasTV': 'True', 'Corkage': 'True', 'HappyHour': 'True'}
categories: Restaurants, Beer, Wine & Spirits, Food, Italian
text:
4:30 on a Thursday, me and my man grab the last table available in the bar for our impromptu stop for a glass of wine and an appetizer.

We order 2 glasses of house white for $4.25 each and a Pizza Margherita for $4.75

The server (not our waitress) dropped or pizza off at the table with nary an inquiry of additional needs---I would have loved some red pepper flakes to spice up my afternoon.

The pizza was "delish" as usual; a nice crispy-chewy crust, with a hint smokiness from the wood burning oven flavor.  The sauce is not too acid-y, so it's just right for me. And such a steal at the price, it's at least a 9 inch pie!

The wine, is acceptable. Not memorable. But I rarely encounter a "house" wine that knocks my socks off.

We ordered the Bruschetta as a second appetizer, and were told it would be Tomato Salsa with Buffalo (meat, not mozzorella).  

We were sooo disappointed when the Bruschetta arrived; 2 lonely pieces with not a buffalo in sight. Instead it was a Balsamic Tomato puree (or some such) with home-made ricotta.  About 1/2 a teaspoon of ricotta on each, to be exact.

Skimpy, skimpy, skimpy.  That's $2 per piece of toast smeared with tomato and a dollop of ricotta.  Hmmm, about 3 average sized bites per piece.  Am I getting too critical?

Stay with the pizza and you'll be happy.
